changelog: Added automatic tab switching based on area.
Added support for options, and autoloading of options on connect.
Added event tracking to show when bosses are defeated.
Updated individual area maps to have a cleaner look.
Improved combined map layout, and added visual indicators for how zones connect.
Added 'peeks', which are little squares near connectors to other areas, that show all of the checks in those areas.
Removed duplicated location names (thanks again, David!).
Logic hasn't yet been updated, that will come in the next update.
